function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Unreliable data transmission due to wpan collapse","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate error checking and data processing in ’calibration’ mode may result in inaccurate or incomplete measurements, impacting the accuracy of disease propagation monitoring","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Buffering measurements without sufficient quality assurance may lead to the inclusion of erroneous data in the analysis, impacting the accuracy of disease propagation monitoring","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proprietary firmware for xbee module may pose security risks and vulnerabilities to the network.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Switching system architecture from arduino avr to arm cortex","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Selection of sensor parameters based on nabers indoor environment rating scheme","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intrusion of technology into immediate workspace","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unprecedented insight into commercial office building ieq performance through environmental monitoring and building operations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Varied spatial and temporal distribution of indoor environmental parameters , air speed, air pollution concentrations increase the complexity of accurate ieq monitoring.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presumed linearity in relationships between ieq factors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Completely ignoring interaction effects in ieq models","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of standardised measurement protocols for ieq","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Problems around the opportunity costs of occupants spending 30 to 60 minutes filling in a questionnaire.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Confounding factors such as industrial relations climate, staff morale, and personal issues influencing how occupants rate their workplace environment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for complex multi-modal interactions that impact occupants in actual office buildings when assessing environmental conditions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependent variables like cognitive performance impacting scientific evidence","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of standardized poe protocol for occupant surveys","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Aggressive pursuit of certification from ieq accreditation schemes leading to performance-focused decisions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reluctance of building operators to relax control may hinder the implementation of measures to mitigate contagious diseases propagation in the built environment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tardy adoption of new technologies and slow uptake in the buildings sector may result in inadequate measures to address contagious diseases propagation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited control of tenants over indoor environmental quality may lead to suboptimal conditions for mitigating contagious diseases propagation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Subjective evaluations of indoor environments by occupants may not align with objective measures, leading to discrepancies in assessing indoor environmental quality.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Narrow control clauses in commercial office tenancy agreements may lead to suboptimal indoor temperature management, potentially impacting occupant comfort and energy efficiency.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High energy expenditure during the operational phase of buildings and non-compliance with energy efficiency standards can lead to significant environmental and climate impacts.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid growth of technology industry leading to increased data mining and analytics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Democratization of analytics for non-experts through easy-to-use web tools and dashboards","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Emphasis on big data leading to prioritization of data-driven research over traditional scientific method","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Growth of iot and wsn implementation without harmonization of noninteroperable technologies and protocols.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in managing big data from wireless sensor networks, characterized by volume, velocity, and variety.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Industry-driven development of business intelligence and analytics bia tools without significant academic input.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dense distribution of sensing devices increases the risk of pathogen spread in case of contamination.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wireless transmission of data between nodes may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases if nodes are contaminated.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Largescale deployment of wsn without proper security measures may lead to unauthorized access and potential malicious interference, including spreading malware or viruses.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proliferation of network-addressable devices embedded in everyday objects","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Number of connected devices to reach over 20 billion ’things’ by 2020","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Placement of wireless sensing devices nodes in and around the phenomena of interest","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of off-the-shelf transducers may lead to inaccuracies in data collection for thermal comfort field studies.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited scale and scope of proof-of-concept or project-specific ieq monitoring systems may hinder their widespread implementation in built environments.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shift in technological context to low-cost hardware and open-source software may introduce cybersecurity vulnerabilities in ieq monitoring systems.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of efficient ieq monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate measurement of indoor environmental quality ieq","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of outdated comfort assessment systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate health policymaking in china and elsewhere","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on curbing climate change","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of concern for the health of the environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Correlation between air pollution and human illness","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extended survival of bioaerosols due to pms and no2","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher mortality rates in provinces with worst air pollution","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Technical and methodological differences between ground-stations and satellite observations could lead to discordance in correlation analyses, impacting the interpretation of air pollution levels.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uneven spatial coverage and limited spatial coverage of traditional ground stations may lead to incomplete representation of pollution levels experienced by populations in their proximity.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
